code: import{Fragment,useEffect,useState}from'react';import InputWithError from'../../../../animations/input-error-field';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ContactEnter=_ref=>{let{TOPIC}=_ref;const[fio,setFio]=useState(TOPIC.fio);const[phoneNumber,setPhoneNumber]=useState(TOPIC.phoneNumber);const[error,setError]=useState(false);const[warning,setWarning]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{try{TOPIC.fio=fio;TOPIC.phoneNumber=phoneNumber;}catch(error){if(error.message=='пустое значение'){setWarning(true);}else if(error.message){setError(true);}}},[fio,phoneNumber]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"createTopic-phase",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"createTopic-phase-annotation",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"2/9"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\u041A\u043E\u043D\u0442\u0430\u043A\u0442\u043D\u0430\u044F \u0438\u043D\u0444\u043E\u0440\u043C\u0430\u0446\u0438\u044F"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"createTopic-phase-inputs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputWithError,{placeholder:"Имя Фамилия",value:fio,setValue:setFio,error:error,setError:setError,errorText:'Не верное значение',warning:warning,setWarning:setWarning,warningText:'Заполните поле'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputWithError,{placeholder:"+7-000-000-00-00",value:phoneNumber,setValue:setPhoneNumber,error:error,setError:setError,errorText:'Не верное значение',warning:warning,setWarning:setWarning,warningText:'Заполните поле'})]})]})});};export default ContactEnter;
